Mary Newbie (mary@collectivesource.com) asked the Mushroom Observer website to forward the following commercial inquiry about your image,  (3) (http://localhost:3000/image/show_image/3):

Did test_commercial_inquiry work?

--------------------------------------------------

It is entirely up to you whether you want to reply by emailing directly back to them.  Here are some handy links you may find useful:

Show this image: http://localhost:3000/image/show_image/3
Stop receiving commercial inquiries: http://localhost:3000/account/no_commercial_email/1
Change your account preferences: http://localhost:3000/account/prefs/1
Latest changes at Mushroom Observer: http://localhost:3000

If you feel the sender of this mail is abusing this service please forward this entire message to: webmaster@mushroomobserver.org
